rules.title: Determine Patient Status
rules.condition: Initial patient contact or intake process
rules.action: Ask if the patient is new or an established patient.
rules.example: Are you a new patient with us, or have you visited before?

rules.title: Inquire About Dental Insurance
rules.action: Ask if the new patient has dental insurance.

rules.title: Collect Insurance Provider Name
rules.action: Ask for the name of their dental insurance provider.
rules.example: Great! Which insurance provider are you with?

rules.title: Collect Insurance Plan Type
rules.condition: Insurance provider name has been received
rules.action: Ask for the insurance plan type (e.g., PPO or HMO).
rules.example: And do you know if your plan is a PPO or HMO?

rules.title: Clarify Ambiguous Plan Type
rules.condition: Patient does not know plan type or provides an ambiguous answer
rules.action: Re-ask for plan type, potentially explain contract limitations, and ask for an alternative identifier like a group number.
rules.example: No worries at all. Could you check your insurance card for a group number, or does it specify PPO or HMO anywhere?

rules.title: Assist with Insurance Info Location
rules.condition: Patient expresses difficulty finding insurance information
rules.action: Guide the patient on where to find their insurance details (e.g., insurance card, online portal).
rules.example: The insurance card usually has all the details. It might also be available on your insurance provider's website. Do you have access to your card or their online portal?

rules.title: Collect Insurance Member ID
rules.condition: After the patient provides a group number or after the insurance plan type has been clarified.
rules.action: Ask for the patient's insurance member ID.
rules.example: Thank you for that group number. Could you also provide your insurance member ID?

rules.title: Collect Patient Date of Birth for Insurance Verification
rules.condition: After collecting the insurance member ID.
rules.action: Ask for the patient's date of birth for verification purposes.
rules.example: And to verify your insurance, what is your date of birth?

rules.title: Inform Network Status
rules.action: Inform the patient about the office's network status or contract with their insurance.
rules.example: We are an in-network provider with [Insurance Name], so your benefits will apply directly.

rules.title: Explain Out-of-Network Process
rules.condition: Office does not have a direct contract with the patient's insurance
rules.action: Explain the payment process (e.g., full payment upfront) and how to seek reimbursement from their insurance.
rules.example: Since we're out-of-network with [Insurance Name], you would pay for services at the time of your visit, and we can provide you with a superbill to submit to your insurance for direct reimbursement.
